title: Excess Expenditure Appropriation (2013) Act, 2016
content:
Excess Expenditure Appropriation (2013) [No. 37 of 2016 781
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
ACT
No. 37 of 2016
Date of Assent: 18th November, 2016
An Act to approve the excess expenditure of monies aggregating
five hundred and seventy-three thousand, six hundred and
thirty-five kwacha.
[ 22nd November, 2016
ENACTED by the Parliament of Zambia. Enactment
1. This Act may be cited as the Excess Expenditure Short title
Appropriation (2013) Act, 2016.
2. The expenditure on the services of the Republic during the Appropriation
financial year which ended on 31st December, 2013, of the monies
indicated in respect of the services in the third column of the
Schedule, being expenditure in excess of the monies appropriated
for the services by the Appropriation Act, 2013, and the Act No. 19 of
Supplementary Appropriation (2013) Act, 2015, is approved. 2013
Act No. 9 of
2015
Single copies of this Act may be obtained from the Government Printer
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00
782 No. 37 of 2016] Excess Expenditure Appropriation (2013)

(Section 2)
No. of Appropriation
Head Institution Amount
